JobTitle: Senior Back End Engineer - Java, PostGres, Cassandra
JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways.  Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible - and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day. 
There are hundreds of opportunities to make your mark on technology and life at American Express. Here’s just some of what you’ll be doing:

Analyze user stories and problems to develop technical architecture and solutions for new and existing platforms and providing architectural mentorship and oversight
Build common frameworks and reusable assets using Open Source and proprietary software
Conducts code reviews and builds test automation
Work with other senior level engineers, architects and platform owner to help set the platforms’ technical direction and strategic objectives
Conduct hands-on research and complex investigations across complex delivery efforts
Build working prototypes to validate proposed solutions and minimize risk associated with delivery efforts
Solve novel problems that impact products and/or technologies
Design new techniques, methodologies, and concepts for solving broad cross-cutting initiatives
Perform reviews and provide oversight across various delivery teams to ensure alignment with architectural and technical strategy
Reviews others' systems designs to ensure selection of appropriate technology, efficient use of resources, and integration of multiple systems and technology
Drive key architecture decisions to solve critical, complex problems for core and adjacent platforms
Network with peers on technical matters, design prototypes, system designs and enterprise-wide research projects
Work with senior architects to drive reuse and simplify complexity
Focus on driving architecture towards long-term Business Unit/Enterprise goals and objectives


8+ years of active architecture, design, engineering, and implementation experience in a complex enterprise environment
Hands-on experience with technology/frameworks such as Java/J2EE/Spring/vert.x/RxJava/Armeria/GRPC
Hands-on experience with databses like PostGres, Cassandra, in memory datastore like Ignite/GridGain, caches like Redis
Hands-on experience in the development of enterprise-grade RESTful APIs using Micro services architectural style
Ability to setup CD/CI pipeline using Git/Jenkins & ability to containerize applications using Docker
Ability to plan, define and communicate executable technology strategies
Proven experience in successful design, creation and deployment of applications with high throughput, performance, fault-tolerant and scalable
Shown ability to transform business requirements into high quality technology solutions
Ability to participate in the prevention, diagnosis, and resolution of system outages as an authority in the underlying architecture
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Systems, or related field
Experience building cloud native/serverless applications preferred

Employment eligibility to work with American Express in the U.S. is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for these positions.
